name: An aqueous mixture containing peroxyacetic acid
hydrogen peroxide
acetic acid
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
and optionally sulfuric acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture containing peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0); hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1); acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7); 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and optionally sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
